about_the_game:
Follow an epic high fantasy story as you and your companions explore the world, upon a quest to rid the threat of the Demon King. This game is an autobattler but with abilities and spells that are used by the player, but it is also a visual novel, where you follow quests and adventures and make choices.

You and your party will go on adventures, fight battles and bosses to complete detailed and diverse quests, with a large variety of enemies. Each adventure is unique, but can be played a few different ways to give replayablility.

Alot of the gameplay revolves arounds Guilds and the players reputation with them. Complete quests and sell loot to the guilds to gain reputation so to buy legendary weapons and hire new characters for your party.

Each hero class has 5 different abilities in the game and there are a 12 classes of hero in the game. With a planned total of at least 25 characters to choose from.

However the player, as the leader of the party, is different. He uses his skills to buff his companions; and uses magic to cast elemental spells

Level up your characters constellation skill tree to increase their capability in combat and learn new abilities.

Purchase new equipment, gain it as loot from battles, or craft it, to improve the stats of your heroes.

Please Wishlist - Coming Soon!

content_descriptors.notes: There are certain character designs with revealing outfits. There are moments in cutscenes during game when some characters may be portrayed as naked, but no actual explicit content is shown.
